html: 5.14.17  6:54 pm   can you please answer me lol

5.14.17  6:54 pm   I mean, what are you even doing with your life.

     expressing myself, as best i can

5.14.17  6:54 pm   You've mentioned wanting to focus on medium sized projects. Would that consist of videos the size of history of Japan, or something more like alphabet shuffle in terms of length?

     i would like to aim for between 20 seconds and 4 minutes

5.14.17  6:48 pm   Why do people actually think your typos are unintentional? It is the subtlety of the meme!

     ah someone who *gets it*

5.14.17  6:47 pm   what day of the scale of 1-10 is it

     where i live, the days are counted on scales of 7, 30, 31, 28, 29, or 365. not 10
5.14.17  6:42 pm   Will you actually respond to this?

5.14.17  6:42 pm   Do you like goats?

     they are ok

5.14.17  6:38 pm   What happens when the unstoppable force meets the immovable object?

     i don't think either of those things really exist

5.14.17  6:35 pm   How often do you QOIJAOGIJoijoaIJGOIJEOGJojoiajgoiJOIGJojiaoijOJojoiJGOI098U30U09g09U?

     i am doing it right now

5.14.17  6:32 pm   If you drop soap on.the ground, does that make the ground clean or the soap dirty?

     i don't think so

5.14.17  6:31 pm   which country is your favorite?

     i like the unique qualities of each one
5.14.17  6:28 pm   what inspired you to start creating videos, esp your very short videos?

5.14.17  6:27 pm   did Vine change the way you made videos and thought of videos, or were extremely short, looping videos the types of videos you were already making? like, did the fact that they looped kind of change the way you thought of all videos, giving you new ideas for videos on other formats? sorry if i'm not being clear, here

     i was already making short videos before then, because i was trying to do 4 videos per week in order to jump start the video making, and as a result they all had to be short, so then when i found out about vine i figured it would be a good place for them because you can enjoy them better if they repeat. but after i was on vine, then i got the idea of making ones that seamlessly loop musically. unfortunately those ones actually don't really work as well without looping, so now that vine is gone i would like to find another place to put them, where they loop. i am considering putting vine versions on the site, looped

5.14.17  6:26 pm   why are we here

     why is who where

5.14.17  6:23 pm   hey, you say you create as many videos/songs a day as you possibly can, as quickly as possible - do you drink coffee or tea or other caffeinated beverages to help you accomplish this? or do you prefer to just drink coffee/tea/etc for pleasure? or do you not really drink them at all? sorry if this is kind of a weird question. i'm just trying to determine part of your method for making so many videos so quickly.

     it doesn't really have anything to do with coffee or tea. basically the trick is to just use all my time for working on the current project. like when people do things in their free time, like hang out with friends, play video games, play frisbee, go to the mall, play lazer tag, etc etc etc. instead of doing any of those things, i work on the current project(s) instead
5.14.17  6:16 pm   You've answered ~16,959 questions prior to May - averaging 22.76 per day. What's your motivation?

5.14.17  6:15 pm   you seem to enjoy interesting ideas and topics. What, to you, defines interesting?

     if i am interested, i guess

5.14.17  6:14 pm   Using control+g / control+f, I found that you are yet to use the word xylophone in an answer. Could you please change this?

     i will wait for the right time

5.14.17  6:04 pm   WHAT IF I ALREADY AM USING CAPITAL LETTERS?

     then you will not be able to make anything bigger, unless you change the size of the font

5.14.17  6:00 pm   u like butts?

     they are ok

     because he was awesome

     no

     already took it

5.14.17  5:15 pm   It seems like making HoJ and HotEWIG put a lot of stress on you. That being said, do you think this will be the end of your long-video making?

     i would like to focus on projects of a more medium size
5.14.17  5:14 pm   Can you link this question to the recording of you saying "the sun is a deadly lazer"

5.14.17  5:13 pm   In response to your answer on 5.14.17 12:41 am: I don't know about Andriod phones, but I know you can search for text on an iPhone by using the very middle button on the bottom menu of Safari (it should look like a box with an arrow pointing up out of it). Just click that button, scroll the menu to the right, click the magnifying glass icon, and search the keyword you want.

     oh that's wild. never found that before. thank you!

5.14.17  5:05 pm   Is staying in bed with a blanket over your head something you've considered?

     yes

     If you have what was your conclusion?

     the conclusion is different each time

5.14.17  5:00 pm   What advice would you give to a youngster?

     be young for a while, then perhaps get older

5.14.17  4:42 pm   Do you avoid the YouTube comment section? You used to reply there sometimes.

     yes, it has become too insane now. it is not a healthy place for me to spend time. this questions page is a much safer alternative, but it has been getting more insane also

     that big button kinda scares me so I rather do

5.14.17  4:31 pm   so nothing created everything?

     i don't think so

     sure

     i dropped myself on my head when i was young

     the power rangers were created as an ensemble. to pick a favorite would be a disrespect to the ensemble

      It's quite mysterious
